sn22.64:1: At Sāvatthī. Then a certain bhikkhu approached the Blessed One … and said to him:sn.iii.75
sn22.64:2: "In what way, bhikkhu, do you understand in detail the meaning of what was stated by me in brief?"
sn22.64:3: "Good, good, bhikkhu! It is good that you understand in detail the meaning of what was stated by me in brief. In conceiving form, bhikkhu, one is bound by Māra …as above in full… by not conceiving it one is freed from the Evil One. It is in such a way that the meaning of what was stated by me in brief should be understood in detail."
